posts.postText:
People are asking to be unblacklisted and I really don't know what to tell them other than "It's permanent" could there be a subforum in the JailBreak section or unban section?

Also, I thought mods were supposed to get the blacklist command. 

Another question; wasn't Gash supposed to make damage logs?
I don't see how they would be so confusing, unless there is something about them that I don't know.

>> I don't see how they would be so confusing, unless there is something about them that I don't know. 

Well.. Not so much as confusing as... Long as hell.

People regen health, meaning they last a lot longer.
More targets take more damage while giving more damage and whatnot.

>> >> I don't see how they would be so confusing, unless there is something about them that I don't know. 

Well.. Not so much as confusing as... Long as hell.

People regen health, meaning they last a lot longer.
More targets take more damage while giving more damage and whatnot. 
However required if we need to catch most RDMers.
